DOC.brief_title: Efficacy HIFU-AR Blood Loss Reduction Patients With Liver Metastases Requiring Hepatectomy
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year day consent study . Patients liver metastasis require hepatectomy ≥ 2 segment . ECOG PS ≤ 1 . Adequate bone marrow liver function baseline define : Platelet count ≥ 100 x 109/l , hemoglobin ≥ 9 g/dl ) , Total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN , AST ALT ≤ 5 x ULN . Recovered prior antineoplasic treatmentrelated toxicity ( grade < 2 persistent treatmentrelated toxicity per CTCAE v4 accept ) . Willingness followup visit . Covered medical insurance . Signed date informed consent document indicate patient inform aspect trial prior enrolment . Patients previously undergone major hepatic surgery ( i.e . 3 liver segment ) biliary major surgery . Patient cirrhosis sinusoidal obstruction syndrome portal hypertension . Pregnant woman ( woman childbearing potential require negative pregnancy test within 72 hour prior inclusion ) .
